name: Campus Crisis
description:
You wake up disoriented....

Your friend, Reese, is missing...

And you're locked in the study room. You think to yourself, "What time is it...? "

It's CAMPUS CRISIS TIME!

Embark on a journey with your lifelong friend as the two of you attempt to reach your final exam before it starts. Together, you and Reese must navigate through various rooms on campus and pick up your exam materials as you go. But each new room poses its own challenge, and the clock continuously ticks closer and closer to your exam...

You know you're close to failing this class and missing your final would guarantee a permanent F on your transcript. If that happened, you AND Reese would fall 3 credits short from graduating. But it's clear they don't share your sense of urgency, and while Reese is happy to help, sometimes they... make things worse. 

As the deadline approaches, something unexpected happens that forces you to make a difficult decision: Do you choose yourself or prioritize the ones you love?

With multiple endings, what will YOU choose?

FEATURES:

  • Multiple puzzles
  • Numerous dialogue options
  • Multiple endings

You can also play the game online here: https://mfdavies.github.io/YellowTeam/play.html
